import re

def remove_html_tags(html: str) -> str:
    clean_text = re.sub('', '', html)
    return clean_text

mutants.code:
import re

def remove_html_tags(html: str) -> str:
    clean_text = re.sub('<[^>]*>', 'MUTATED', html)
    return clean_text
